directions: Using coarse grater held over medium bowl, grate tomatoes down to skin. Discard skin. Add 1/3 cup olive oil and garlic to grated tomatoes. Season mixture to taste with salt and pepper. (Tomatoes can be prepared 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature.)
Place toast pieces on platter. Drizzle with additional oil. Place anchovies in small bowl. Serve toast, passing tomatoes and anchovies alongside.
ingredients: 1 16-ounce French-bread baguette, halved lengthwise, halves cut on diagonal into 4-inch-long pieces, lightly toasted
title: Toasted Baguette with Tomatoes and Anchovies
